text: is a Japanese judoka and world champion. Born in Fukuoka, Hirofumi is a graduate of Kansai University. He received a gold medal in the lightweight class at the 1965 World Judo Championships in Rio de Janeiro, and a silver medal at the 1967 World Judo Championships in Salt Lake City. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Japanese male judoka Category:Kansai University alumni
title: Hirofumi Matsuda
